alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:52AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Buena Vista County. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
